text: int main ( ) { int k , n , a [ 1000 ] , b , t , i , j = 0 , m , c = 0 , min , f = 1 ; ; float d ; char s [ 1000 ] , l [ 1000 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; c = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] ) { c = c + a [ i ] ; } else if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) { c = c + a [ i + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; } return 0 ; }
